name: Sesame Peanut Noodles 🥗
description: These sesame peanut noodles are a deliciously tangy and nutty dish that's perfect for a quick lunch or dinner.
instructions: In a blender, combine the peanut butter, soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, water, brown sugar, garlic, and ginger and blend until smooth.
In a large bowl, combine the spaghetti, carrots, cabbage, and edamame, then pour over the peanut sauce. Use tongs to toss well until the sauce is fully incorporated.
Divide the noodles between serving bowls and garnish with peanuts, black sesame seeds, and scallions.
